monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Breaks hidden walls - Cuts through vines
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Allows the Monster to equip an additional accessory.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Shield by 30% of the damage dealt to enemies by critical hits. Increases critical chance by 7%.

skills.name: Assault Shield
skills.description: Shield by 30% of the damage dealt to enemies by critical hits. Increases critical chance by 7%.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Barrier
skills.description: Applies Barrier (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Bleed
skills.description: Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt.

skills.name: Boulder Toss
skills.description: 1 x 500% physical damage (earth) ignores 50% of the target's Defense damage reduction value, cannot be dodged

skills.name: Brawler
skills.description: When exploiting an enemy's weakness with an attack, gain Might (Buff) and shield self by 75% of this monster's Attack value.

skills.name: Counter Attack
skills.description: When getting attacked, hit the attacker for 1 x 200% Attack. Hit can't be dodged and has 20% increased Critical Chance.

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Crit Damage Focus
skills.description: Critical Damage values from equipment increased by 50%.

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Consistency
skills.description: +10% Critical Damage. Critical Damage also increases non-Critical hits by 10% of the amount.

skills.name: Critical Defense
skills.description: Reduces damage taken by 10% of own Critical Damage value.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 36)

skills.name: Earth Affinity
skills.description: Earth attacks deal 10% increased damage.

skills.name: Earth Resistance
skills.description: Earth damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Equipment Mastery
skills.description: Allows the Monster to equip an additional accessory.

skills.name: Fatal Cut
skills.description: 2 x 160% (320%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt, applies a stack of Wound.

skills.name: Fire Weakness
skills.description: Fire damage increased by 50%

skills.name: First Impact
skills.description: Increases the base damage of the first hit of an attack by an additional 40% of Attack (physical) or Magic (magical). (25% for mass attacks)

skills.name: Freezing Punches
skills.description: 3 x 65% (195%) physical damage (water)

skills.name: Freezing Punches Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 60% (240%) physical damage (water)

skills.name: Freezing Punches Lvl 3
skills.description: 4 x 75% (300%) physical damage (water)

skills.name: Freezing Punches Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 75% (375%) physical damage (water)

skills.name: Freezing Punches Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 80% (480%) physical damage (water)

skills.name: Frost Pierce
skills.description: 8 x 65% (520%) physical damage (water) Critical Damage +75% every hit has a 15% chance to apply Chill (Debuff).

skills.name: Full Offense
skills.description: Applies Might, Sorcery & Glory (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Offense Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Might, Sorcery, Glory & Sidekick (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Offense Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Might, Sorcery, Glory, Sidekick & Channel (Buffs)

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Health Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 5% of Max Health.

skills.name: Heavy Punch
skills.description: 1 x 225% physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Heavy Punch Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 290% physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Heavy Punch Lvl 3
skills.description: 1 x 360% physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Heavy Punch Lvl 4
skills.description: 1 x 450% physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Heavy Punch Lvl 5
skills.description: 1 x 565% physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Heroic Defense
skills.description: Reduces damage taken by 2% for every Buff on this Monster.

skills.name: Heroism
skills.description: Deals 2% increased damage for every Buff on this Monster.

skills.name: Hunt
skills.description: Aura: Increases the Critical Chance of the whole party by 4%.

skills.name: Improved Assault
skills.description: Aura: Every Monster in the party deals 3% increased damage for each Might, Sorcery and Glory Buff on them.

skills.name: Improved Mana Regeneration
skills.description: +20% Mana Regeneration

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Protector
skills.description: Aura: All Monsters in the party receive 7.5% less damage.

skills.name: Recuperate
skills.description: Critical Hits regenerate 7 Mana.

skills.name: Shocking Hit
skills.description: If a single hit deals more than 20% of the enemy's Max HP (10% against Champions), the enemy is afflicted with Shock (Debuff) and a stack of Blind.

skills.name: Situational Support
skills.description: When this Monster uses a non-damaging action for the first time in combat, apply a random Buff on all allies and shield them by 20% of their Max Health.

skills.name: Slash
skills.description: 1 x 210% physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Slash Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 120% (240%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Slash Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 155% (310%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Slash Lvl 4
skills.description: 3 x 125% (375%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Slash Lvl 5
skills.description: 3 x 155% (465%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Stone Rain
skills.description: 3 x 65% (195%) physical damage (earth)

skills.name: Stone Rain Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 60% (240%) physical damage (earth)

skills.name: Stone Rain Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) physical damage (earth)

skills.name: Stone Rain Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 60% (360%) physical damage (earth)

skills.name: Stone Rain Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 80% (480%) physical damage (earth)

skills.name: Sustain
skills.description: Applies Barrier (Buff) to whole party Applies Regeneration (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Sustain Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Barrier (Buff) to whole party Applies Regeneration (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Sustain Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Barrier & Regeneration (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Weakening Crush
skills.description: Every physical attack hit has a 15% chance to apply Weakness.

skills.name: Weaponry
skills.description: Aura: Increases the stats gained from weapons by 25% for allied Warrior Monsters.

drops.name: Phoenix Tear
drops.description: Revives target Heal target for 4 x 200
